Description: Powers up Grass-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.
Notes: When a Pokémon with Overgrow uses a Grass-type move, the move's Attack or Special Attack will be increased by 50% if the user has less than or equal to ⅓ of its maximum HP remaining.

Description: Powers up Fire-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.
Notes: When a Pokémon with Blaze uses a Fire-type move, the move's Attack or Special Attack will be increased by 50% if the user has less than or equal to ⅓ of its maximum HP remaining.

Description: Powers up Water-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.
Notes: When a Pokémon with Torrent uses a Water-type move, the move's Attack or Special Attack will be increased by 50% if the user has less than or equal to ⅓ of its maximum HP remaining.

Description: The Pokémon is charged with static electricity and may paralyze attackers that make direct contact with it.
Notes:
When a Pokémon with this Ability is hit by a move that makes contact, there is a 30% chance that the attacking Pokémon will become paralyzed. This can affect Ground-type Pokémon.

If a Pokémon with this Ability is hit by a multistrike move that makes contact, each hit has an independent chance to activate this Ability.

Description: Protective dust shields the Pokémon from the additional effects of moves.
Notes: Pokémon with Shield Dust are unaffected by the additional effects of other Pokémon's damaging moves, including additional effects provided by Poison Touch, Toxic Chain, Stench, King's Rock, and Razor Fang.
